participant_1.background:
I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work.
I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.
I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending my free time reading about different cultures, and learning about the world.
i m allergic to cats.
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions.
I play the bass guitar because it is a good instrument for someone who is well built and tall.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going great! I just finished my walk in the canyon and am enjoying some breakfast.
I'm glad to hear that! I love hiking and being outdoors. I wish I could take a walk in the canyon, but I'm allergic to cats.
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that. I love cats, but I understand that not everyone is a fan.
Yeah, it's not the worst thing in the world. I just have to be careful about where I go and what I do.
That's understandable. I'm glad you're able to enjoy the outdoors in other ways.
Thanks! I love to read about different cultures and learn about the world. I'm also a teacher, so I'm always looking for new ways to satisfy my hunger for knowledge.
That's awesome! I love learning new things too. I'm a wedding planner, so I get to learn about a lot of different cultures and traditions.
That sounds like a really interesting job! I'm sure you get to meet a lot of interesting people.
I do! I love meeting new people and helping them create their dream weddings.
That's so great! I'm sure you make a lot of people happy.
I try! I love my job.
